§quizType
choice

§quizBalls
4

§quizQuestion
Что будет в консоли ?



§quizJS
class Card {
  constructor (pin) {
    const pincode = pin
    let cash = 0
    function testPin () {
      return prompt('Enter pin') === pincode
    }

    this.showCash = () => console.log(testPin() ? cash : 'Invalid pin')
  }
}

const card = new Card(prompt('Set pin'))

for (const prop in card) console.log(prop)



§choiceVariants
pin
pincode
testPin
showCash
ничего


§rightChoice
3
